mapper.select: select core_label.`_key`,core_label.msgtext as default_value,trl.msgtext from core_label left JOIN (select _key,msgtext,lang from core_label_trl where lang=#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) trl ON core_label.`_key` = trl.`_key` where isactive='Y' ORDER BY core_label._key

select core_message.`_key`,core_message.msgtext as default_value,trl.msgtext from core_message left JOIN (select _key,msgtext,lang from core_message_trl where lang=#{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) trl ON core_message.`_key` = trl.`_key` where isactive='Y' ORDER BY core_message._key
